channel.title: Closeall()
channel.description:
Ok when i added some quest and stuff i used the method c.closeall() @ actionbuttons class (do i miss this method at client class? so yeah how can i make one)
when i compiled this i get this error: [code].\src\ActionButtons.java:129: cannot find symbol symbol : method closeAll() location: class Client c.closeAll(); ^ .\src\ActionButtons.java:134: cannot find symbol symbol : method closeAll() location: class Client c.closeAll(); ^ .\src\ActionButtons.java:176: cannot find symbol symbol : method closeAll() location: class Client c.closeAll();][/code]

item.title: Closeall()

item.title: Closeall()
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

O.o how about we create a new one!

add to your client.java

public void closeAll(){
				NpcDialogue = 0;
				NpcDialogueSend = false;
				RemoveAllWindows();
}

and add this

	public void RemoveAllWindows() {
		outStream.createFrame(219);
		flushOutStream();
	}

Yay new code working woo hoo

Read full topic

item.title: Closeall()
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

There is no method with the name of closeAll() in your client class. Ethier your using the wrong method or you need to create the method; And no, I’m not going to give it too you because I only have the delta code for it, and I doubt you know how to convert it.
